titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B133_2
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B133_2

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

1.| rḍwn | qtd(m) | [h-m]r[ʾ]-s | 2.l | w-dwsm | m(s)[bm | b]n | ẓrb | h 3.gnʾ | qlt | w-ʿqbhn | [m]t | ḥḏrw | b-ḥ 4.w-bny | w-yʿr | ʿqb | ḍyfthn 5.bn-mw | rbbm | ʾd | šqrm | bn-mw | lbn | (šm)
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.škmm | slḥn | bn | rḍwn | qtdm | h-mrʾ-s | yšhrʾl | yhrʿš | bn | ʾbyśʿ | mkrb | ḥḍrmt | mt | ʾmr-s | mrʾ-sww 2.hyśʿʾl | ʿlhn | bn | bnʾl | w-dwsm | msbm | bn | ẓrb | h-bnʾ | ẓrb | h-bnʾ | ʿqbthn | qlt | w-ʿqb | ḥgr | ʿlhtyhn | bn | bḥrhn | qdmm | ʿlhy | gr= 3.bt | w-nhmt | w-gsmhy | gnʾ | qlt | w-ʿqbhn | mt | ḥḏrw | b-ḥmyrm | w-tbʿ | hyśʿʾl | w-dwsm | w-ʿm-smn | bn | ʾbhty | ḥḍrmt | w-mtsk b- 4.myfʿt | w-ḍyftn | qrnhm | w-bny | w-yʿr | ʿqb | ḍyfthn | w-bny | gnʾhn | w-mḥfdyhn | yḏʾn | w-yḏtʾn | w-ḫlfhn | ykn | b-mʿrb | w-śdm | w-ḍwym 5.[... ... |] w-ʾbry | bn-mw | rbbm | ʾd | šqrm | bn-mw | lbn | šms | lbn | šms | b-hy | yšrḥʾl | ḏ-ʿḏḏm | śnyhn | šlśt | ʾwrḫm | b-ʿšry | w-mʾt | ʾsdm | gsmhm

škmm slḥn bn rḍwn qtdm h-mrʾ-s yšhrʾl yhrʿš bn ʾbyśʿ mkrb ḥḍrmt mt ʾmr-s mrʾ-sww
hyśʿʾl ʿlhn bn bnʾl w-dwsm msbm bn ẓrb h-bnʾ ẓrb h-bnʾ ʿqbthn qlt w-ʿqb ḥgr ʿlhtyhn bn bḥrhn qdmm ʿlhy gr=

myfʿt w-ḍyftn qrnhm w-bny w-yʿr ʿqb ḍyfthn w-bny gnʾhn w-mḥfdyhn yḏʾn w-yḏtʾn w-ḫlfhn ykn b-mʿrb w-śdm w-ḍwym
w-ʾbry bn-mw rbbm ʾd šqrm bn-mw lbn šms lbn šms b-hy yšrḥʾl ḏ-ʿḏḏm śnyhn šlśt ʾwrḫm b-ʿšry w-mʾt ʾsdm gsmhm

Text preserved in the squeeze:
1.Riḍwān has directed for his lord 2.Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masa[bum] 3.the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥ[imyarum.] 4.and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān 5.from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[Shakimum Salḥīn bin] Riḍwān has directed for his lord, [Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,] 2.[Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin] Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masa[bum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace(?)] 3.[.. and the polished stones and the fill of] the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥ[imyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at] 4.[Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison;] and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān [and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge] 5.[... ... and the passages(?)] from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas [in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by 120 men.]

Text preserved in the squeeze:
Riḍwān has directed for his lord
Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum
the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum.
and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān
from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas
Restored full text of the inscription:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace?
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge
and the passages? from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by
men.

Text preserved in the squeeze:
Riḍwān has directed for his lord
Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum
the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum.
and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān
from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas
Restored full text of the inscription:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace?
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge
and the passages? from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by
men.

Restored full text of the inscription:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace?
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at

and the passages? from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by
men.
